articles.title: Drug to treat OCD could reduce hospitalisation risk in Covid patients, study in Lancet says - ThePrint
articles.description: The study says antidepressant fluvoxamine could reduce the production of inflammatory molecules called cytokines that can be triggered by SARS-CoV-2 infection.
articles.content: New Delhi: Fluvoxamine, an antidepressant used for the treatment of major depressive disorders and obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), can reduce the need for hospitalisation among high-risk Covid-1… [+3629 chars]
